description:
Citi's mission is to serve as a trusted partner to our clients by responsibly providing financial services that enable growth and economic progress. Our core activities are safeguarding assets, lending money, making payments and accessing the capital markets on behalf of our clients. We have 200 years of experience helping our clients meet the world's toughest challenges and embrace its greatest opportunities. We are Citi, the global bank – an institution connecting millions of people across hundreds of countries and cities.

For information on Citi’s commitment to privacy, visit on.citi/privacy.

updates.text: CEO Jane Fraser on Citi’s latest business performance and the proof points that its global strategy is working, via CNBC.

Discover how finance leaders navigate FX market volatility to align their organizations for successful global growth in Citi Commercial Bank’s latest podcast episode, “Business and Risk Management Impacts of International Expansion.”

Jon Boaden CFO of Volex; Kyu-Ha Choi, Head of Treasury and Risk Management of Coroplast Group; and Sylvia Huang in Citi’s FX Structuring and Solutions team, join host Huaijin Bao, Global Head of Industrials for Citi Commercial Bank, as they dive into currency risk management strategies. Tune in now: https://on.citi/3USeSCG
Rodrigo San Pedro, CFO, Mexico at Smart Fit, shares how Citi has helped Smart Fit to expand their business through speedy implementation of solutions. Learn more: https://on.citi/4hLUA80

Citi recently commemorated its 60th anniversary in the UAE with CEO Jane Fraser. The event was attended by Citi’s global and local executives as well as many government, business, and industry leaders in the UAE. From pioneering innovative financial solutions to facilitating economic growth, Citi has been an integral part of key sectors in the UAE, serving as a catalyst for development and prosperity. Read more here: https://on.citi/4foegxd

The UK economy is broadly perceived to have stagnated, its growth having fallen behind that of many peer nations. Productivity growth in particular has shifted from moving in lockstep with the U.S. to decoupling from it since the Global Financial Crisis. What’s behind the UK’s lackluster performance? And what’s needed to change its trajectory? 

Join Lucy Baldwin and Citi’s Chief UK Economist Ben Nabarro as they look under the hood of the UK economy and discuss its prospects for charting a better path.

Listen to the episode here: https://on.citi/4etMZIi

From ride-hailing apps to insurance companies, many businesses can benefit from tech built around instant payment schemes. Discover the benefits of instant payments, from greater efficiency to increased customer satisfaction here:

We’re honored to have won The TRADE News' Leaders in Trading 2024 Algorithmic Trading Award for 'Best Provider – Large Clients.'

These awards highlight the year’s leading buy-side, sell-side, service providers, technology firms and venues in the industry. We’re proud to be recognized by Citi's global equity client base as a trusted execution counterpart in EMEA.

For more information about these awards, visit: https://on.citi/4fLdJ85

Last week, I had the privilege of connecting with our talented Internal Audit teams in Mexico City. I'm continually impressed by the dedication, innovation and resilience demonstrated across every level of our organization in Mexico. 

The town hall with our awesome teams was a highlight - a chance to celebrate wins, address questions and focus on the future. The team's determination, resilience and commitment shine through as they push for excellence, support one another and drive our mission forward. Proud to work alongside such a motivated, dedicated team. Thank you for all that you do!

Jimena Hernández, Treasury Manager at Saavi Energia, shares how Citi has played a strategic role as their head bank to provide high-standard cybersecurity and increase the firm’s treasury automation. Learn more: https://on.citi/3O9mooY
